events.message: We received the candidate's application for the software engineer position promptly this morning.
The application was reviewed and categorized under the engineering department based on the mentioned skills.
A recruiter from the engineering recruitment team has been assigned to manage this candidate's application.
The initial screening call with the candidate was successful, covering background and development experience.
The candidate responded enthusiastically to the initial screening feedback and expressed interest to proceed.
A technical interview with the senior engineering team has been scheduled for next Wednesday at 10 AM UTC.
The technical interview was completed successfully, and the candidate demonstrated strong coding and problem-solving skills.
An HR interview was scheduled to discuss company culture and candidate expectations following the technical round.
The HR interview was conducted smoothly, with the candidate showing alignment with company values and policies.
An official job offer was proposed to the candidate outlining salary, benefits, and joining date details.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and requested some clarifications about remote work policies.
The candidate accepted the job offer enthusiastically and expressed eagerness to join our engineering team.
The onboarding process commenced for the new software engineer, including equipment setup and team introduction.
The hiring process was officially closed with the candidate successfully integrated into the engineering department.
